[[File:Soundestiny Live Recording.jpg|250px|thumb|right|Soundestiny]]

'''Soundestiny''' is a Neo-celtic Folk Rock band based in [[wikipedia:Brisbane|Brisbane, Australia]]. They have produced two albums (2004, 2010) featuring music inspired by ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. The 25 original songs from these two albums together form their "RingLord saga" - a Rock musical inspired by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. They have also released an EP (2009) and a full album (2012) containing music inspired by ''[[The Hobbit]]''.

==Members==
*Darryl Potter (vocals, guitars, keyboards, flute)
*Kim Sewell (drums, percussion, vocals)
*Elissa Maclean (vocals).

From time to time other artists have recorded with the band. These include Clyde Schipke (guitars), Max Mathers (bass), Julia Lefik (vocals), Mick Bohl (guitars) and Paul Lines (vocals).

===Selected Discography===
* [[2004]]: ''[[Shadow Rising]]'' (RingLord Saga Part 1 of 2)
* [[2009]]: ''[[All that Glitters]]''
* [[2010]]: ''[[Winds of Change]]'' (RingLord Saga Part 2 of 2)
* [[2012]]: ''[[Dragon Quest]]''
